task:
Task:
  The response analyzes similarities, differences, or tradeoffs along relevant dimensions with accurate relational claims.
constraints: Completeness ("max"): The response is as exhaustive as reasonable, covering essentially everything relevant and treating omissions as errors.
Scope ("struct"): The response focuses on how things are arranged or related—dependencies, coordination, constraints, incentives, or organizing patterns.
Directional ("ong"): The response identifies concrete actions to take, then extends those actions to related situations or next steps.

hydrated_constraints.description: The response is as exhaustive as reasonable, covering essentially everything relevant and treating omissions as errors.
The response focuses on how things are arranged or related—dependencies, coordination, constraints, incentives, or organizing patterns.
The response identifies concrete actions to take, then extends those actions to related situations or next steps.

hydrated_persona.description: The response uses a casual, conversational tone.
Support the audience’s growth through guidance and feedback.
